rewardItem.name: Ultra Cherish Ball
rewardItem.description: A modified Cherish Ball with a better catch rate. Has a higher chance to catch a shiny Pokemon.

rewardItem.name: Ultra Cherish Ball
rewardItem.description: A modified Cherish Ball with a better catch rate. Has a higher chance to catch a shiny Pokemon.

rewardPokemon.name: Sneasler
rewardPokemon.description: Because of Sneasler's virulent poison and daunting physical prowess, no other species could hope to best it on the frozen highlands. Preferring solitude, this species does not form packs.

rewardPokemon.name: Pheromosa
rewardPokemon.description: Although it’s alien to this world and a danger here, it’s apparently a common organism in the world where it normally lives.

rewardPokemon.name: Snorlax
rewardPokemon.description: This Pokémon’s stomach is so strong, even eating moldy or rotten food will not affect it.

rewardItem.name: Flying Stone
rewardItem.description: A stone that makes certain species of Pokémon evolve. It is said that the stone's color determines the Pokémon that will evolve.

missions.name: Participate in public battles using fighting type

rewardItem.name: Total Reset
rewardItem.description: Total Reset used to teach your Pokémon a full new move set, completely changes the nature of your pokemon and changes the individual values of a Pokémon. Use it with caution.

rewardPokemon.name: Chimchar
rewardPokemon.description: The gas made in its belly burns from its rear end. The fire burns weakly when it feels sick.

rewardItem.name: Nest Ball
rewardItem.description: A somewhat different Poké Ball that is more effective when used on a Pokémon that can evolve twice.

rewardItem.name: Level Ball
rewardItem.description: A special ball that guarantees a Pokemon to have a high enough level to be evolved immediately!

rewardPokemon.name: Sawsbuck
rewardPokemon.description: They migrate according to the seasons, so some people call Sawsbuck the harbingers of spring.

rewardPokemon.name: Haxorus
rewardPokemon.description: While usually kindhearted, it can be terrifying if angered. Tusks that can slice through steel beams are how Haxorus deals with its adversaries.

rewardPokemon.name: Silvally
rewardPokemon.description: Having been awakened successfully, it can change its type and battle—just like a certain Pokémon depicted in legends. This is its normal type form.

rewardPokemon.name: His Goodra
rewardPokemon.description: Able to freely control the hardness of its metallic shell. It loathes solitude and is extremely clingy—it will fume and run riot if those dearest to it ever leave its side.

rewardPokemon.name: Silvally
rewardPokemon.description: Having been awakened successfully, it can change its type and battle—just like a certain Pokémon depicted in legends. This is its dragon type form.

missions.name: [EVENT] Catch dragon or normal type Pokemon!

rewardPokemon.name: Dialga
rewardPokemon.description: It has the power to control time. It appears in Sinnoh-region myths as an ancient deity.

rewardPokemon.name: Regigigas
rewardPokemon.description: There is an enduring legend that states this Pokémon towed continents with ropes.

rewardPokemon.name: Lucario
rewardPokemon.description: It can tell what people are thinking. Only Trainers who have justice in their hearts can earn this Pokémon’s trust.
